mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MNO, MID, MPW, MNAME, MTEL, MADDRNO, MADDR1, MADDR2, MAUTH, MEMAILCHK, MDELETEYN, MINSERTDATE, MUPDATEDATE )VALUES( #{mno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mpw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maddrno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maddr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maddr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', #{memailchk, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
